00008 namespace BS_NMSP
00009 {
00010         class ScriptMachine;
00011 
00019         class _BSAPI Emitter : public DeepMemoryPoolObject
00020         {
00021                 friend class EmitType;
00022 
00023                 // Struct for controlling smooth interpolation of an Emitter member variable.
00024                 struct MemberController
00025                 {
00026                         float time;
00027                         bstype speed;
00028                 };
00029 
00030                 // Emitters can be enabled or disabled by Controllers.
00031                 bool mEnabled;
00032 
00033                 // Due to the way Emitters are recycled, we need to know if an Emitter has been deleted since
00034                 // the last time an EmitTypeControl used it (eg for anchors).  Thus, when an Emitter is created,
00035                 // its anchor index is set to 0, as is its last anchor index.  When it is acquired, the anchor index
00036                 // is set to last index + 1, as is the last index.  When it is released, the anchor index is reset to 0.
00037                 int mAnchorIndex, mLastAnchorIndex;
00038 
00039                 // Controllers for member variables.
00040                 MemberController mMemberControllers[BS_MAX_USER_MEMBERS];
00041 
00042                 // Bitfield for MemberControllers set.  This limits the number of member variables
00043                 // to 32, but this is an acceptable limitation.  In reality, the user can only define
00044                 // up to BS_MAX_USER_MEMBERS members, defined in bsConfig.h.
00045                 uint32 mActiveControllers;
00046 
00047                 int mNumUserMembers;
00048 
00049                 bstype mLastX, mLastY;
00050 #ifdef BS_Z_DIMENSION
00051                 bstpe mLastZ;
00052 #endif
00053                 bstype mLastAngle;
00054 
00055                 ScriptMachine* mScriptMachine;
00056 
00057                 ScriptRecord* mRecord;
00058 
00059                 // Weak pointer to user-supplied object.
00060                 void* mUserObject;
00061 
00062         private:
00063 
00064                 void runScript(float frameTime);
00065 
00066         public:
00067 
00071                 explicit Emitter(ScriptMachine* machine);
00072 
00079                 void onRelease();
00080

00113                 void setDefinition(EmitterDefinition* def, bstype x, bstype y, bstype z, bstype angle);
00114 #endif
